Sparkle was a housecat owned by Ravens Bluff resident Bevis Roland in the midâ€“14 century DR.
At some point, the older brother of Sparkles owner&mdashRussell Roland, a member of the citys Council of Lords&mdashspread a rumor throughout Ravens Bluff with the help of the magic-user Grimalkin the Sage that claimed the housecat was actually a basilisk that had been polymorphed. Russells motivation for spreading this rumor was a desire to discourage strangers from bothering his young sister.
